About Me...
I'm married to a wonderful wife, Rachel and have three fabulous children, Jasmine, Eddie & Amber. Rachel first introduced me to yoga all those years ago!

My children give me something to aim for in my yoga. They breathe so effortlessly and have such amazing, natural flexibility!
I practiced yoga for over 12 years before deciding to become a yoga teacher. I'm a scientist and keenly interested in the bridge between western medicine and eastern philosophy. I'm also influenced by Taoism, Buddhism, Hinduism and Sufism.
